price: 15. Miyeydaan arag sida Alle u abuuray toddobada samo ee kala korreeya.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
